title: Loft-Style Duplex Haven with Smart Charm in Wilda
description: Step into a spacious and beautifully designed duplex, blending urban sophistication with serene privacy across 132sqm. This sunny 3-bedroom, 3-bath treasure impresses with expansive windows, soaring ceilings, and thoughtfully curated modern touches. The heart of this home is its open living space, enhanced by a smart home system and a seamlessly controlled modern lighting design, ensuring your environment is always just as you desire. Whether hosting friends or enjoying a peaceful remote work session, the tranquil bedrooms—including a dreamy walk-in closet and your own fitness nook—elevate daily living not just in location, but in lifestyle.
neighborhood_description: Wilda vibrantly balances Poznan’s energy with its own relaxed yet trendy rhythm—creative spaces tucked among cafés, lush parks, and pet-friendly lanes. Well-connected with public transport and bordered by smooth bike lines, the neighborhood encourages easy city access as well as inspiring wanderings on foot or wheel.
lifestyle_benefits: tranquil, quiet rooms ideal for focus and creativity
inspiring surroundings rich in character and style
target_buyer: Perfect for remote workers, creative professionals, or young couples who value flexible, work-from-home spaces blended with modern design and amenities to enjoy both productivity and relaxation. Also great for those with pets or seeking seamless city access with a neighborhood feel.
market_positioning: This duplex stands apart in Wilda's high-demand market by combining an impressive suite of smart home technologies with lush comfort and flexibility tailored to creative lifestyles. The price positions it enticingly for buyers seeking a refined but down-to-earth retreat within walking distance of Poznan’s excitement and workplace hubs.
